description: Temporary test exclusions for CI hybrid approach - tests to be gradually fixed and re-enabled

cross_platform_issues.description: Tests failing due to Windows/Linux path or command differences
tests: test/executors.test.ts:should execute simple shell command successfully

database_schema_issues.description: Tests failing due to missing database tables or schema changes
tests: test/media-intelligence.test.ts:should have created new media intelligence tables
test/media-intelligence.test.ts:should allow inserting media transcript data
test/media-intelligence.test.ts:should allow inserting media tags data

mcp_server_registration.description: MCP server tool registration not working properly in test environment
tests: test/new-mcp-servers.test.ts:should register all tools across servers
test/scheduler.test.ts:should create a schedule for a task

media_task_execution.description: Media processing tasks with missing files or services
tests: test/media-intelligence.test.ts:should handle media_tag task gracefully when file missing
test/media-intelligence.test.ts:should handle index_meili task gracefully when media missing
test/media-intelligence.test.ts:should handle index_chroma task gracefully when media missing

configuration_issues.description: Missing or incorrect configuration for external services

file_permission_errors.description: File system permission and access issues

review_service_quality.description: Review service output file quality scoring issues

whisper_availability.description: Whisper transcription service availability and model issues
